form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form 1-357

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/29/2023 IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS ON BACK OF PAGE ONE BEFORE FILLING OUT MEMORANDUM U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1978-253-704 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles, CA File No. A21 293 871 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Name SEX DATE OF BIRTH Street NGUYEN, Tran Bich F 10/10/15 Address PLACE OF BIRTH 1802 E.
